projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.shortDescription: Full-stack e-commerce solution with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL
projects.fullDescription: A comprehensive e-commerce platform featuring real-time inventory management, secure payment processing with Stripe, advanced product filtering, and a responsive admin dashboard. Built with modern technologies and best practices for scalability and performance.
challenges: Implementing real-time inventory management across multiple warehouses
Handling payment processing securely with PCI compliance
Optimizing database queries for large product catalogs
Managing complex state for shopping cart and checkout flow
solutions: Used WebSocket for real-time inventory updates and notifications
Integrated Stripe with proper security measures and webhook handling
Implemented database indexing and query optimization with Redis caching
Utilized Redux Toolkit for predictable state management

projects.title: Task Management Application
projects.shortDescription: Collaborative task management tool with real-time updates
projects.fullDescription: A modern task management application that enables teams to collaborate effectively. Features include drag-and-drop task boards, real-time collaboration, file attachments, comments, and advanced filtering. Built with React, Firebase, and Material-UI.
challenges: Handling real-time collaboration with multiple users
Optimizing performance with large task lists
solutions: Leveraged Firebase Realtime Database for instant updates
Implemented role-based access control with Firebase Auth
Applied virtualization for rendering large lists efficiently

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.shortDescription: Real-time weather tracking with interactive maps and forecasts
projects.fullDescription: An interactive weather dashboard that provides real-time weather data, 7-day forecasts, and interactive maps. Features location-based weather, severe weather alerts, and historical data visualization. Built with React and integrated with multiple weather APIs.
challenges: Displaying complex weather data in an intuitive way
solutions: Created a unified data layer to normalize different API responses
Implemented efficient caching and debouncing for API calls
Used Mapbox GL for smooth map interactions
